features: 【Exquisite Magnetic Blocks Kit】UREC 2023 new upgraded magnetic balls and rods set contains 64pcs magnetic building blocks, an idea booklet and a storage bag. Compared with ordinary magnetic blocks, it has stronger magnetism and can build more complex shapes without collapsing, bringing your children a better play experience. let the children to create all sorts of imaginative masterpieces.

【Great STEM Learning Toys】Magnetic building balls and sticks toys are the best choice of educational toys and learning tool. It helps children develop hand-eye coordination, color recognition, and stimulate their imagination and creativity, It is a great educational toy for children as well as a great STEM toy to play at a family! As it says, the best way to learn is through playing.

【Stronger magnet & safety】magnetic building blocks is made of high-quality ABS and has 2 strong neodymium magnets inside, the edge of the magnetic block is smooth, and the surface is frosted to make the touch more comfortable. Ultrasonic pressing technology, with stronger sealing, perfect to prevent children from swallowing magnets due to rupture. Please rest assured to play for your children.

【Create Dreams in Learning】Children are artists without enlightenment since childhood, they are curious about new things and have a strong sense of color, but how to tap their talents to a greater extent has become a difficult problem for every parent. in that case, why not accomplish both with an educational and hands-on magnetic construction toy set that allows them to express their inner creativity? We encourage every child to turn what they think into reality.

【Best Gift for Kids】As necessary toys for Preschool Learning Activities, magnetic blocks are popular among toddler aged 1-2,2-4. Stimulate children's imagination, creativity and hands-on ability by building various shapes. Kid will enjoy the fun of this Stacking game and learn by playing. Ideal gifts for birthday, STEM, School events, Halloween, and Christmas.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: UREC 64 PIECES MAGNETIC BUILDING STICKS BLOCKS FOR TODDLERS TOYS

Stronger & Well-made Magnetic balls and rods set is made of high quality ABS and super strong magnets. Ultrasonic pressing technology, better sealing, perfect to prevent breakage. Perfect STEM educational sensory toys for kids ages 3-5 year old. Learning by Playing Magnetic blocks is a highly regarded educational resource. Children can develop math, science, spatial, and tactile skills while learning how to problem-solve and work as a part of a team. Suitable for kids ages 3-5 year old boys and girls. Smooth Safe Design Magnetic block smooth edge design can effectively protect children's hands from being hurt when playing, large size, do not worry about children swallow, let every child play safe and healthy is the purpose of our service.

Perfect Christmas/Birthday Gift for Boys and Girls of All Ages UREC magetic building blocks toys, inspire children's manipulative ability, imagination and creativity, problem solving, social skills, motor skills, perfect for 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 10 Year Old Boys Girls Kids Gifts. Whether it's outdoor activities or family gatherings, this is a great gift for kids. Perfect gift for birthday, Children's day, Christmas, STEM, school activities, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great magnet set
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my grandson. He loves this set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for 20- mo old toddler
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter loves these magnets. Her 12-yr old and 16-yr old siblings played with her and the blocks for hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Endless Fun with Magnetic Blocks: A Family-Friendly Delight
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased magnetic blocks and couldn’t be more pleased. The delivery was prompt, and the blocks were of excellent quality—no missing or broken pieces. While the instruction book added a creative touch, it included colors not in the package, making it challenging for younger children to follow.Despite this minor setback, the magnetic blocks have become a source of entertainment for my entire family. From imaginative creations like shapes, dinosaurs, and flowers to more complex structures like runic cubes, the possibilities are endless. Watching everyone showcase their creativity and problem-solving skills has been a delight. I only wish I had bought more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great quality, works well. Nice product. Just what I was looking for. Kids love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The magnets need to be stronger
reviews.reviewText: Our creations fall apart because the magnets are not strong enough to hold them together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Creative and fun
reviews.reviewText: Love the ability of making different shapes with this easy put together toy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Weak magnetic power
reviews.reviewText: The magnetic power of these pieces were not adequate. You could not link pieces together longer than a few and have them hold. Try another brand.
